name: SoFaygo
description: '''Andre Dontrel Burt Jr.''' (born October 3, 2001), better known by his [[stage name]] '''SoFaygo''' (formerly stylized as '''$ofaygo'''), is an American rapper and singer. His 2019 single, "[[Knock Knock (SoFaygo song)|Knock Knock]]", went viral on [[TikTok]] in late 2020 before it received [[RIAA certification|platinum]] certification by the [[Recording Industry Association of America]] (RIAA). The following year, he guest appeared on [[Trippie Redd]]'s song "[[Trip at Knight|MP5]]", which marked his first entry on the [[Billboard Hot 100|''Billboard'' Hot 100]]. He signed with fellow rapper [[Travis Scott]]'s [[Cactus Jack Records]] to release his debut studio album, ''[[Pink Heartz]]'' (2022).
